phrases: Are you... Mari?!
I had sworn to myself that I would never speak that way in front of you.
But to think that was precisely what made you remember me, Raku-sama...
That is rather ironic, is not it?
It is starting to come back to me.
I actually did make friends with a girl who talked like that, many years ago.
I am really sure she was frail too.
Yes, our first meeting was during that summer ten years ago, Raku-sama.
That summer ten years ago?
That makes you the same as Onodera and Chitoge...
Episode 15: Three Keys
Episode 15: Three Keys
Episode 15: Three Keys
Our first meeting was during that summer ten years ago, Raku-sama.
As I was very frail when I was a little girl,
my father brought me to a sanatorium in the mountains, where the air was fresh and clean.
It was another day of boredom for me in my hospital room.
But then...
Since I would always been so delicate,
I would never quite had the chance play outside with other children.
Oh?
So your name's Marika, huh?
Well, my daddy always calls me Mari anyhow.
Anyhow?
Mari it is, then.
When you heard that, you started coming to my room every day,
Look!
bringing me back little things you would found on the mountain, as souvenirs, and showed me such a good time.
Wow!
That is amazing!
She is right.
I do remember doing that, years ago!
Your kindness made me so happy, Raku-sama.
And then one day, my father asked me...
Mari, have you taken a fancy to that young'n?
Just say so, an' I will make him marry you.
Really?
Say, Rakkun.
Tell me, Rakkun, what kind of girls do ya like?
Huh?
Girls?
Um, I do not know.
Well, girly girls, I guess?
Like, ones with long hair and stuff.
Starting that day, I went right to work!
All the lessons and practice that I used to hate, I threw myself into them!
I mastered the proper manner of speech and acquired an education!
It was full speed ahead for me to become the ideal woman that you sought!
That was all I did for so many years, just to meet you once more.
Our promise was the one thing that kept me going.
Please forgive me for speaking as if you have an obligation to me.
It is just that...
I wanted so desperately to convey how I feel.
We had that photo taken when we were about to part ways,
so that we would never forget our cherished promise.
She did it for me?
She loved me that much, then?
To me, it hardly meant anything at all.
Who knew it was so important to her?
Well, please do not feel so badly about it.
I am fully aware that wanting you to remember me was my own self-indulgence.
Therefore, you do not have to force yourself to remember me anymore.
What?
Oh... no way!
Wait right there!
I am going to concentrate with every nerve in my body!
I appreciate the gesture, but it is really all right.
Instead...
I want you to take me in as you see me now: everything about me.
The Marika who became such a lovely girl for your sake.
I want you to see that.
I will flaunt myself to you, and I have made up my mind about it.
From here on in, I am going to make sure you do not forget me!
So anyway, first things first...
Oh, Raku-sama, you have a grain of rice on your cheek!
Huh?
Where?
An unforgettable memory...
That is the first one.
Well, then, Raku-sama.
I will see you at school tomorrow.
Have a wonderful day!
Huh?
Miss Marika, what about your medicine?
I do not need it!
I feel much better now!
We have met before, ten years ago?
Yes, your father certainly said so.
He said you two were pretty close, too.
Cannot you remember anything?
No...
Not at all...
By the way, why is your face so red?
Do you have a cold?
No, it is nothing...
But from the moment that I first saw you,
I did get the feeling that we could be good friends, Chitoge-chan.
No way!
Me, too!
Me, too!
Wait, why did you wait so long to tell us something so important?
Well, the thing is, I could not find the right time!
And?
These are the keys in question?
I never dreamed that you would have a key like this, too, Kosaki-chan.
Same here.
I wonder what this means.
We all met Darling ten years ago, made some kind of promise, and now we all have keys.
What is going on?
How should I know?
As far as I know, I only made the promise with one girl.
So what was that promise about in the first place?
I cannot remember, no matter what.
Me neither...
None of you remember what the promise was about?
You mean, you remember?
Well, but of course, it could be none other than a promise of marriage!
What?
Am I wrong?
I just assumed it was the same for the rest of you, too.
That was the promise I made when I bade Raku-sama farewell.
Although he may not remember that!
Darling, did not you say you made such a promise when you said goodbye?
Do not you think she is the one?
W-Well, I do not know about that...
Like, there is still a lot we do not know...
Marriage?
Is it possible that I made such a bold promise with Ichijou-kun, too?
If... If I did...
I knew it was some kind of important promise,
but I never would have thought...
Well, then why are there three keys?
You should know, right?
The truth about this promise...
Oh, you did not want to tell us, right?
How about just a little hint?
Let me see...
I apologize.
That I do not know myself.
Yeah, but you
You were totally bragging about how you knew the answer!
Yesno, I am very, very sorry.
To be honest, I am also astonished.
I never knew that there were others apart from myself with keys.
Today is the first I have heard of it.
Though I do recall that in our conversations,
you had mentioned another playmate of yours.
Then this truth of yours...
Needless to say...
I was referring to how much I was in love with you when I made that promise!
I know only what concerns my own promise, after all.
Nothing more.
So that means one of these keys is real, and the others are not.
If that is the case, then we are stuck waiting until your locket is repaired, right?
Well, in any case, I am the one who shall wed Raku-sama.
After all, we have already shared a kiss.
A kiss?
Wait!
You cannot fool us anymore.
I know you are just saying that to
Waityou two kissed?
No, no, no!
No, no!
It was so sudden!
I had no way of resisting!
So you did kiss!
Lowlife scum!
I cannot believe you!
You filthy beast!
Kissing a girl you have just met.
Hey, it was not really a kiss!
Her lips just touched my cheek, that is all!
Well, considering who is more appropriate for Raku-sama, it is only natural, I think.
Well, well!
You are one to talk, after making a move on my darling!
You thieving cat.
Well, at least cats are more endearing than gorillas.
I am more suitable for Darling!
No, I am!
Whose side are you on, Kosaki-chan?
What do you think, Onodera-sama?
Uh, um...
Well, I...
Oh, yes, before you answer...
Tell us, how do you feel about Raku-sama?
Perhaps you are thinking that you might have promised to marry him years ago,
and possibly that you and he
It is possible that I might have made such a promise years ago,
but for now I think of him as a good friend.
Is that right?
In that case, let us be friends!
No way!
Kosaki-chan is my friend!
Good friend, huh?
Well, that is a bummer.
Now, now, why so uptight?
You certainly are a stingy gorilla.
So Ichijou-kun and I did meet in the past.
Then, that makes him my first love.
Kosaki-chan does not need a thieving cat like you for a friend!
But what if Ichijou-kun loves Chitoge-chan?
Oh, my!
What a loud voice you have, Gorilla!
Oh, man, you make my blood boil!
What is so funny?
One of those girls is the one I made the promise with?
What a barbaric gorilla you are!
But the one I love now is Onodera.
My feelings right now and my feelings from the past, huh?
Well, it is all but settled that my key is the genuine one.
Raku-sama and I are bound by the red thread of destiny
Yeah?
So why did not he remember a thing about you, then?
Do not you give me that hogwash, now!
What was that?
I do not know.
Whatever are you talking about?
No, nothing at all!
And so, Raku-sama, will you be so kind as to meet my father tomorrow?
I told you, you need to come by at least once to pay your respects.
We also have to decide on the date of our engagement.
Wait, what are you trying to get at?
Did not I make it clear that I had no clue that I had a fiancee?
Yes, I am well aware of that.
However, that does not mean that our engagement has been annulled.
And besides, we just might see the good in each other for the first time once we have become husband and wife!
I am not even old enough to get married yet.
Listen, Tachibana-san, do you not think that you are being rather shameless?
In front of his girlfriend, even!
Oh, my, forgive me for being so remiss, Kirisaki-san.
Thank you for always being so kind to my husband.
Who are you calling your husband?!
He never even acknowledged the engagement in the first place, did he now?
That means it is invalid!
Oh, that is no obstacle.
Parents have been arranging engagements for their children since time immemorial.
If that upsets you, you will have to take it up with my father.
What are you going to do?
Well, what choice do I have?
The way she steamrolled over me, I cannot ditch now.
Looks like you have not given up being an indecisive bean sprout!
Well, what do you expect me to do?
If you go ahead and show up at her house,
you are going to come back with a wedding date all settled.
Wh-What is it?
It is just that, lately your acting could fool even me.
Wh-What is that supposed to mean?
I mean, it is like you are possessed or something.
It is just that if my people found out that you had a fiancee...
I-I am not doing it for myself, but if they were to find out...
I know, right?
If he finds out, who knows what that Four Eyes will do to me?
Listen up.
You are going to stand up to her father and have him call off the engagement, all right?
Like it is going to be that simple.
The entire top floor of this building is my home.
The entire floor?
By the way, Tachibana...
My, my, did you call me Tachibana?
Please feel free to call me Marika!
What kind of guy is your dad, Tachibana?
You said he was the police commissioner, right?
So he is probably pretty scary, huh?
Oh, no, far from it!
My father is a very kind man!
He even calls me Mari, and he is constantly worrying about me.
I am sure that you will like him, too, Raku-sama.
Ah, home already, Mari?
That was quick.
Oh, my, Father!
I was just about to summon you.
Whoa, scary!
Her old man's face is so scary!
For a second there, I thought he was a yakuza!
Actually, he is even more imposing than any yakuza!
Father!
This young man is my fiance, Ichijou Raku-sama.
Is not he gorgeous?
Yes.
Um...
It is a pleasure to meet you.
Yo, I... Sorry, I mean I...
Ah, so you are Ichijou's son, huh?
You have grown up.
You are starting to take after your old man, I would say.
Just have a seat.
Let us have a nice, long chat.
Is your old man doing all right?
Y-Yes.
See this scar?
Uh, um, it looks really cool!
Were you injured on the job?
Like a badge of honor?
Your old man gave me this scar many years ago.
Now that you are the spitting image of your father, looking at you
is making it throb all of a sudden.
What the hell were you thinking, Dad?!
Well that was also the day we acknowledged each other's power.
We may have been on different sides,
but we did bond enough to drink together, man-to-man.
But to this day, my dream is to toss that bastard behind bars!
S-Scary!
This old man is beyond scary.
He is way more like a yakuza than any of our guys!
There is no way in hell I have the balls to tell him to call off the engagement!
Well, let us set aside such trivial matters for now.
Time certainly flies!
My Marika is old enough to get married now, huh?
I am sure that you have cared deeply for her all this time yourself.
Well, of course I
Raku-sama tells me that he had forgotten all about me.
Hey, you!
Come on!
You plumb forgot?!
Hey!
What in blue blazes are you sayin'?
I see.
You were never told about this engagement, is it?
Damn that scumbag...
How dare he treat a promise between two men so lightly!
Next time I see him, I will make him pay in full!
But if that is the case, there is one thing that bothers me.
Of course you are not in love with another girl right now, are you?
No, of course not
Oh, he has a girlfriend.
Oh, come on!
Girlfriend?
Did you come callin' here when you done got yourself a girlfriend?
Whoa!
Wait!
Wait!
Wait!
Father, please calm down.
He is not the one to blame here.
Despite everything, I am fine with the situation.
I have made up my mind to steal him from his girlfriend.
Otherwise, I would not be worthy of being joined with him in marriage.
If you say so, then I have no objection.
By the way, are you always close to my daughter like that?
What?
No, this is just...
Marika's one-sided
R-Rest assured!
Our relationship is nothing but honorable and virtuous
Oh, my!
Look at you, Raku-sama!
There is no need to be embarrassed!
After all, we have shared our first kiss already.
Come on, do you have to go blurting out
Look, you...
Do not you reckon you should be gettin' into that stuff
after you have gotten to know each other a lil' more?
Huh?
Oh, my, this will not do.
To think that I have not even offered you tea yet.
I will be right back with it!
Her timing's awful!
H-Hey, come back here.
Do not leave me alone, please!
Oh, crap, what am I going to do?
This is beyond bad!
I have to find a way out of this!
I have got to think of a good excuse.
That girl... my Marika...
From time to time, even though it is years later,
she will still boast about what you were like back then.
Like, something like this happened, or we talked about such-and-such...
The most trivial things, even now.
All that clutter you left behind in her hospital room back then,
she still treasures it all to this day.
She still talks like that about what happend back then?
From here on in, I am going to make sure you do not forget me.
Well, it does seem to make her happy.
I am sorry, Marika-san's dad, but right now...
Right now, there is someone else that I am in love with.
And it is not Marika-san.
It is not that I dislike Marika-san,
but I have cared for that girl for so long.
So, I am really, really sorry.
Great.
So you finally done gone an' spit it out, huh?
You are still a young'un, so it is not something you can just be practical about.
Are not no need to beat around the bush like that right now.
So that girl, is she your girlfriend?
No, actually, you see...
What is she then?
What are you, a philanderer?
I am not, I am not, I swear I am not!
It is just really complicated, all right?
Oh, well, what the hell.
But a promise is a promise.
Sooner or later, you are going to make my daughter happy, okay?
You keep that in mind, boy.
Mari is quite a handful, you know.
Oh, man.
I wonder if I did the right thing.
How did it go?
Your conversation with my father?
He is a great dad, all right.
I could sense just how precious you are to him.
He is a little scary, though.
I am so glad that you seem to have hit it off!
After all, someday he might become your father too.
It never ceases to amaze me how pushy you can be.
I got to tell you, I am impressed.
Why would you carry it so far?
My, my!
Do I really need to spell it out for you?
Nothing in this world becomes yours if you do not move to acquire it.
It is the same with romanceyour only hope is to be aggressive.
It is like she is talking about me.
All I can do is to make an effort to express my feelings,
and make an effort to change myself.
Raku-sama!
Please enlighten me again.
What kind of girl do you prefer now?
I know I can transform myself in any way, as long as it is for your sake.
Please, your wish is my command.
I would not say I have a preference.
I think you are cute enough the way you are now, Tachibana.
The fact that you have put in all this effort for me
makes me happy, and I think you are an amazing girl.
That is not something that just anyone can do.
And besides, whether your hair is long or short,
whether you talk like you do now, or like you did back then,
either way, I think you are a sweet girl.
Springing something like that on me out of nowhere...
Now I am in a pickle!
No...
Um!
D-Do not look this way, ya hear me?
Do not look this way!
Hey!
Come on!
It is like you have turned into a different person now!
Are you embarrassed, by any chance?
I are not embarrassed by a long shot!
Just stay away from me, ya hear?
Father!
Raku-sama was forward with me!
What is that?
Forward?
What in tarnation did you go and do to my daughter?
I did not do anything!
Mistress, is something wrong?
No.
Another one!
Was not that your tenth one?
